channel.title: About Us on Bing Academy
channel.description: Recent content in About Us on Bing Academy

item.description: More than 20 years ago, we immigrated to the United States with a common goal for our children: to have the best education, live a prosperous life, and have an unlimited and bright future. We started getting involved in the American education system in 2004, and began college planning for our children as early as elementary school. There were no suitable counselors or programs for us at that time. Instead, we learned through books and online research; we studied cases personally by reaching out to universities, parents, teachers, and students.
Number of Students we worked with in private consultation: 2019: 44 2018: 37 2017: 32 2016: 27 2015: 28 2010-2014: 30

High Schools Represented: • Amador Valley • American • Bellarmine • Dougherty • Dublin High • Foothill • Gunn • Harker • Irvington • Leland • Lynbrook • Mission San Jose • Monte Vista • Palo Alto • Phillips Exeter • Pinewood • Saratoga • St. Francis • Washington • Wuhan Yucai International School
